name: LittleRunner_v1
description:
Hello Guys,

Thanks for Coming here, Let me introduced you my first publication on Itch.io.

Little Runner , a game which is based on endless running game. made with  Unity & C#.

In this game many things are implemented as follows:

1. Basics of Unity3D, physics, and many more things.

2. Floor Destroyer, Rock Spawning, Floor& Field Spawning, Coin Spawning made by           C# Sharp Script.

3. Health Monitoring System, Points Monitoring System, and many more.

4. UI buttons with their functionalities.

5. Scene Manager, Animation Control, Sound and Textures.

Thank  you!!
